oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Replication Data for: Vertical size structure is associated with productivity and species diversity in a short-stature grassland: Evidence for the importance of height variability within herbaceous communities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brown, Charlotte
Cahill Jr., J. F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the replication data associated with our article in our "Journal of Vegetation Science" titled "Vertical size structure is associated with productivity and species diversity in a short-stature grassland: Evidence for the importance of height variability within herbaceous communities". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents. (2019-06-07)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
